com.ea.orbit.actors.runtime

Class OrbitActor<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ea.orbit.actors.runtime.OrbitActor<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - a class that represents the state of this actor.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReminderController

    public class OrbitActor<T>
extends Object
    Base class to all actor implementations.

      • clearState

        protected Task<Void> clearState()
        Asynchronously clears the actor's state. This means removing the database entry for this actor.
        Returns:
        a completion promise

      • registerTimer

        protected Registration registerTimer(Callable<Task<?>> futureCallable,
                                     long dueTime,
                                     long period,
                                     TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Registers a timer for the current actor. The timer disappears on deactivation. The timer calls do not keep the actor active.
        Parameters:
        futureCallable - a callable that returns a Task
        dueTime - Time to the first timer call
        period - Interval between calls
        timeUnit - Time unit for dueTime and period
        Returns:
        A registration object that allows the actor to cancel the timer.

      • registerReminder

        protected Task<?> registerReminder(String reminderName,
                                   long dueTime,
                                   long period,
                                   TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Registers or updated a persisted reminder. Reminders are low frequency persisted timers. They survive the actor's deactivation and even a cluster restart.
        Parameters:
        reminderName - the remainder's name
        Returns:
        completion promise for this operation

      • unregisterReminder

        protected Task<?> unregisterReminder(String reminderName)
        Removes a previously registered reminder.
        Parameters:
        reminderName - the remainder's name
        Returns:
        completion promise for this operation
